Class CompareActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      view.CompareActivity

public class CompareActivity
extends Activity

Author:
J-Tesseract CompareActivity These are constants used througout CompareActivity These constants help store the bitmap of the images we are comparing

protected  void setProvidedPic1(ImageView imageView)
          SetProvidedPic1 Here it sets the first image you selected into the first slot for the photo setting its date (from getpTimeStamp) then sending it to handlePic to display the image.
protected  void setProvidedPic2(ImageView imageView)
          SetProvidedPic2 Sets the second photos date from the getpTimeStamp() call of the provided photo then send it to handlePic to display the correct image.

CompareActivity

Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

setProvidedPic1

protected void setProvidedPic1(ImageView imageView)
SetProvidedPic1 Here it sets the first image you selected into the first slot for the photo setting its date (from getpTimeStamp) then sending it to handlePic to display the image. The date is in the format "Month Day, -- Time"

Parameters:
imageView - The ImageView to set the first picture to

setProvidedPic2

protected void setProvidedPic2(ImageView imageView)
SetProvidedPic2 Sets the second photos date from the getpTimeStamp() call of the provided photo then send it to handlePic to display the correct image. The date is in the format "Month Day, -- Time"

Parameters:
imageView - The ImageView to set the second picture to

handlePic

private void handlePic(ImageView imageView,
                       Photo providedPhoto)
handlePic Take the URI from the provided photo and get the FilePath and File Input Stream from the image path then set imageView.

Parameters:
imageView - The imageView to set the provided picture to
providedPhoto - the Photo containing the Uri with the picture to set
Throws:
FileNotFoundexception - e

onClick

public void onClick(View v)
onClick Sets the result for the on click listeners to RESULT_OK then finishes the activity

Parameters:
v - The View that has just been clicked
